text: The monthly rent shall be $1,500, due on the first day of each month.
label: rent_payment

text: Late payment of rent will incur a fee of 5% of the monthly rent amount.
label: rent_payment

text: Rent may be paid by check, money order, or electronic transfer.
label: rent_payment

text: A security deposit of $3,000 is required prior to move-in.
label: security_deposit

text: The security deposit shall be returned within 30 days of lease termination.
label: security_deposit

text: Landlord may deduct from security deposit for unpaid rent or damages.
label: security_deposit

text: Tenant is responsible for routine maintenance and minor repairs under $100.
label: maintenance

text: Landlord shall maintain all major systems including HVAC and plumbing.
label: maintenance

text: Tenant must report any maintenance issues within 48 hours of discovery.
label: maintenance

text: Either party may terminate this lease with 60 days written notice.
label: termination

text: Early termination requires payment of two months rent as penalty.
label: termination

text: This lease shall terminate automatically at the end of the term.
label: termination

text: Tenant is responsible for all utilities including gas and electric.
label: utilities

text: Landlord pays for water and trash removal.
label: utilities

text: All utility accounts must be transferred to tenant's name before move-in.
label: utilities

text: No pets are allowed on the premises without prior written consent.
label: pets

text: A non-refundable pet deposit of $500 is required for each approved pet.
label: pets

text: Service animals are permitted as required by law.
label: pets

text: Tenant may not sublet the premises without prior written consent.
label: subletting

text: Short-term rentals such as Airbnb are expressly prohibited.
label: subletting

text: Subletting requires landlord approval and may incur a transfer fee.
label: subletting

text: Tenant must maintain renter's insurance with minimum coverage of $100,000.
label: insurance

text: Proof of insurance must be provided to landlord before move-in.
label: insurance

text: Landlord's insurance does not cover tenant's personal property.
label: insurance

text: Failure to pay rent within 10 days constitutes default.
label: default

text: Upon default, landlord may pursue all legal remedies including eviction.
label: default

text: Repeated violations of lease terms constitute grounds for termination.
label: default

text: This lease shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.
label: other

text: The premises shall be used exclusively for residential purposes.
label: other

text: Smoking is prohibited in all indoor areas of the premises.
label: other
